import React from "react"; import UploadImage from "../assets/Images/video-list-5.jpg"; import Header from "./Header"; export default function Upload() { const handleSubmit = event => { //creates new comment event.preventDefault(); let comment = { name: "John Doe", comment: event.target.comment.value }; event.target.comment.value.length < 2 // checks if comment length is < 2 ? alert("Please write something meaningful") : this.props.addComment(comment); //calls funtion to add comment to the API document.querySelector("#submit-form").reset(); }; return ( <>
Upload Video
VIDEO THUMBNAIL
TITLE YOUR VIDEO ADD A VIDEO DESCRIPTION
); }
